title: SITKA Gear Men's Boreal Windstopper Beanie
features: Made in the USA or Imported

COMPLETE WINDPROOF PROTECTION - A full GORE WINDSTOPPER membrane combined with a heat-trapping blend of 60g/m2 and 133 g/m2 PrimaLoft insulation and a high-loft Berber fleece interior seals out the cold

PRIMALOFT TECHNOLOGY - This SITKA Gear beanie feature PrimaLoft technology. Such products are the ultimate in insulation technology for hunters. Ultra-fine fibers are engineered to retain maximum warmth even when wet

COMFORTABLE - Made from GORE-TEX INFINIUM with WINDSTOPPER Technology, Polyester Weav, featuring 60 g/m2 PrimaLoft Silver Insulation for ultimate comfort. The beanie features stretch panels for a close and comfortable fit. It is one size fits all

GREAT FOR OUTDOORS - This Boreal beanie is a great item for outdoor lovers that enjoy hunting and fishing. This beanie will keep your head and ears warm in cold temperatures without the heavy bulk feeling

WATERFOWL CAMO - Waterfowl Marsh and Timber patterns bring you both realistic elements to match your hunting surroundings. They are designed for layout and blind hunting in the marsh, standing crops and in the darker environments of flooded timber
description: The Boreal Beanie is the warmest hat in our Waterfowl line, ideal for long blind sessions at extreme latitudes. The 100% windproof GORE-TEX INFINIUM with WINDSTOPPER shell protects your forehead and dome, but is left out over the ears for uninhibited hearing. The remarkably soft Berber liner and 60g/m2 Primaloft Silver Insulation throughout lock in warmth. GORE OPTIFADE Concealment Waterfowl Marsh is designed for layout and blind hunting in the marsh, standing crops, and cut stubble fields. GORE OPTIFADE Concealment Waterfowl Timber is optimized for engagement distances of 10 to 40 yards in the darker environments of flooded timber. Weight: 3.5 oz. Fabric: GORE-TEX INFINIUM with WINDSTOPPER Technology, Polyester Weave. Insulation: 60 g/m2 PrimaLoft Silver Insulation. GORE-TEX INFINIUM with WINDSTOPPER: Offers complete windproof protection through a durable, lightweight, and breathable membrane. PrimaLoft Technology: PrimaLoft products are the ultimate in insulation technology for hunters. Ultra-fine fibers are engineered to retain maximum warmth even when wet.
